price: Tí ẹ̀yin bá ṣàì gbàgbọ́, báwo ni ẹ̀yin yóò ṣe bẹ̀rù ọjọ́ kan tó máa mú àwọn ọmọdé hewú?
arabic: فَكَيۡفَ تَتَّقُونَ إِن كَفَرۡتُمۡ يَوۡمٗا يَجۡعَلُ ٱلۡوِلۡدَٰنَ شِيبًا

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: fakayfa tattaqūna in kafartum yawman yajʿalu al-wil'dāna shīban
